titleInfo.title: Web corpus mining by instance of Wikipedia

mods.abstract: In this paper we present an approach on structure learning in the area of web documents. This is done in order to approach the goal of webgenre tagging in the area of web corpus linguistics. A central outcome of the paper is that purely structure oriented approaches to web document classification provide an information gain which may be utilized in combined approaches of web content and structure analysis.

titleInfo.title: Proceedings of the 11th Conference of the European Chapter of the Association for Computational Linguistics, Trento, Italy, April 3-7, 2006 (EACL 2006): 2nd Web as Corpus Workshop
